title: What are the best sites to meet friends? - Quora

response.answer_text: In this era of technology and ultra advanced technology communication has been made as easy as writing “A, B, C”. There are a lot of well none online platforms to make and meet your long lost pals (grins). Popular ones are Instagram, Facebook, bumble, amidst other host of sites. My favourite and used sites are as follows. INTERPALS (InterPals Penpals)Interpals (More of an online penpal platform) is a fairly known online for making friends and getting to know a whole range of folks from around the world. With well over 2000 daily subscribers makes the use of this sites fun. In addition it serves as a platform for language -study, from learning of Spanish to learning of Twi from real people online. The home page provides you with tons of profiles, click read if you click, (literally) then you message them. Then you take it up from there. With settings embedded, you have the opportuinity to restrict specific countries, age range, and gender from contacting you. This feature makes you narrow down pretty seamlessly the wonderful people you wish to make friends with. Personally, I’ve had the opportunity to meet wonderful people there who constantly shape my life adding value to me, through meaningful chats and paradigm shifts. And oh, if you are lucky you can find your soul mate too :). With it’s web version and mobile apps for android and iPhones (iOS) everything is made super duper easy.  credit : INTERPALS.NET[1] 2. KAKAO TALK (Kakao ) Kakao talk is a Korea based chatting platform, popular in Korea and other Asian countries brings on board a way to connect you too your friends and even find friends anywhere in the world. They have online streaming service that allows you to share music easily with your acquaintances, have a couple of buddies here too.  credit: Kakao Talk These two should help. Please do feel free a to make constructive criticism so I can improve because this is my first time and I wish to become a very profound and in-depth writer thank you. There are a ton of options available. “Best” depends on what you’re looking for specifically (i.e. do you want to meet friends online or locally? friends with pets? something else?).
